mapper.sql: d_g_location_id, simulation_time, soc_mod_need, schedule_id, soc_min, r_isrand, w_r
mapper.select:
SELECT simA.d_g_location_id, simA.simulation_time, simA.soc_mod_need, simA.schedule_id, simA.soc_min, simA.r_isrand, simA.w_r FROM t_simulation_result AS simA INNER JOIN (SELECT d_g_location_id, MAX(simulation_time) AS Latest FROM t_simulation_result GROUP BY d_g_location_id) AS simB ON simA.d_g_location_id = simB.d_g_location_id AND simA.simulation_time = simB.Latest
simA.d_g_location_id = #{DGLocationId}
